ParamsString: Cloud Punishing: Gray Raven is a custom cloud gaming version of Punishing: Gray Raven. You do not need to download the full game package. Play instantly with one tap. Enjoy quick launch, low latency, high graphics quality, and high frame rates.

During the Game Pass's active period, no free cloud gaming time is consumed.\nFree unlimited play is available from the day of activation until midnight the next day, with official timing starting after midnight.\nGame Pass players also receive priority queue access for faster entry.
